welcome_message_body: Welcome to Daiwanishi, Japan! Immerse yourself in the city's rich history, beautiful cherry blossoms, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Daiwanishi has to offer.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (マクドナルド)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (マクドナルド) is a fast food restaurant located in 川西市.

restaurants.name: ケンタッキーフライドチキン
restaurants.description: ケンタッキーフライドチキン is a fried chicken joint located in 猪名川町.
restaurants.address: 松尾台1-2-1 (日生中央サピエ 1F), 猪名川町, 兵庫県, 666-0261

restaurants.name: coffee manna 自家製パン
restaurants.description: coffee manna 自家製パン is a café located in 豊能町.

restaurants.name: Lotteria (ロッテリア)
restaurants.description: Lotteria (ロッテリア) is a fast food restaurant located in 猪名川町.
restaurants.address: 松尾台1-2-1 (日生中央サピエ), 猪名川町, 兵庫県, 666-0261

restaurants.name: Jolly-Pasta 日生中央店
restaurants.description: Jolly-Pasta 日生中央店 is a italian restaurant located in 川西市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
